title: Mederma Skin Care for Scars, 1.76 Ounce
description: Formulated with Cepalin botanical extract. From the leader in scar management. No. 1 doctor & pharmacist recommended product for scars. Greaseless gel. Pleasant smelling. Easy to use. For old and new scars resulting from: surgery, injury, burns, acne, stretch marks. Helps old and new scars appear softer and smoother. Made in Germany.
